H0.text: What is the tallest kind of tree. Mountain Ash

H1.text: What is the tallest kind of tree. Sitka Spruce

H2.text: What is the tallest kind of tree. Giant Sequoia

H3.text: What is the tallest kind of tree. Coast Redwood

A4.text: The current tallest tree is the Hyperion tree, measuring 116.07 m (380.8 ft).

A5.text: Fairly solid evidence indicates that coast redwoods were the world's largest trees before logging, with numerous historical specimens reportedly over 122 m (400 ft).
